Activity: Log in, check emails. Review yesterday's server architecture outline and database schema sketches.
Consult with @SDES-1 and @LDES-1 regarding game mechanics and data requirements. Discuss the type of data the server will need to persist and how frequently it will be accessed.
Refine the database schema based on feedback from designers. Start creating a more detailed entity-relationship diagram (ERD) for the database.

Test the database schema definition by creating sample tables/collections and inserting dummy data. Verify that the schema meets the requirements for storing player data and game state.
Review the day's progress, identify any roadblocks, and plan for tomorrow's activities.
